song.title: Escape from 16-bit-Land
song.info:
(January 2006)
This is *NOT* AY! This is a chiptune with sound-quality of ONE BIT (sound turn-on, sound turn-off, nothing more). Generated by Z80 chip with ULA chip as a transducer.
Author's note: "3 channels (including really cool drums). Made on Orfeus Music Assembler, on Timex 48Kb"
http://mister_beep.republika.pl/music.html
